problem_text_en:
"The object shown is a circular cone placed as shown, with its front view being an isosceles right triangle with leg length 4. The length of the arc of the unfolded lateral surface of the cone is _____. (Express your answer in terms of $\pi$.)" A. $2 \sqrt{2} \pi$
 B. $3 \sqrt{2} \pi$
 C. $4 \sqrt{2} \pi$
 D. $8 \sqrt{2} \pi$
